level.heading: Admissibility in evidence.
level.text: In a proceeding, evidence of a record or signature may not be excluded solely because it is in electronic form.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 15-105 validated previously made technical corrections.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 3202(b) of Fiscal Year 2002 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-124, August 3, 2001, 48 DCR 7861).

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 13 of the Uniform Electronic Transactions Act (1999 Act). See 7A, Pt. I, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
